original_title: 韓国・中国・台湾/東アジア少女たちと異文化交姦日記 極東極秘撮影 4名出演
overview: It was when I traveled to East Asia. I was surprised ... there are still such poor girls in developing countries, and at the same time there are innocent children who don't know the dirt. I was strangely excited to see such a child. The joy of defilement, the desire for control, they won't complain even if they treat it like a guy. Even if you don't understand the language, there is only one world ...
title: Fuck Diary Of Different Cultures With Barely Legal Girls From Korea, China, Taiwan/East Asia Far East Top Secret Shoot
